param.name: X-Coord
param.description: X coord of mouse point. Remember to use "Mouse.X" if dependent on mouse location

param.name: Y-Coord
param.description: Y coord of mouse point. Remember to use "LayoutHeight - Mouse.Y" if dependent on mouse location

param.name: Spirals
param.description: Number of spiral pairs making up tunnel (use 1 to 50)

param.name: Speed
param.description: Speed of tunnel spin (use -50 to 50; 50 is slowest; sign governs inward or outward movement)

param.name: Intensity
param.description: Intensity of colors (use 0 to 50; 0 gives dark shadows)

param.name: Spiral A - Red
param.description: Red element for Spiral A (range from 0 to 1)

param.name: Spiral A - Green
param.description: Green element for Spiral A (range from 0 to 1)

param.name: Spiral A - Blue
param.description: Blue element for Spiral A (range from 0 to 1)

param.name: Spiral B - Red
param.description: Red element for Spiral A (range from 0 to 1)

param.name: Spiral B - Green
param.description: Green element for Spiral A (range from 0 to 1)

param.name: Spiral B - Blue
param.description: Blue element for Spiral A (range from 0 to 1)
